channel.title: First armour piece
channel.description:
Not completely done but this is a chest-piece i have been workin on. Dont like the colors any suggestions?
Hate/Rate/Ejaculate

item.title: First armour piece
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

Just a word of advice…This is way better than any of my first models…i didnt even know what a prim was much less how to manipulate one…but spend more time on it…and odds are if you think and say its lame most likely someone else will to so keep that in mind

Read full topic

item.title: First armour piece
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:


am i turtle enough for the turtle club?
lol ontopic looks alright but try to make the form of the body more human like or just go by the 317 char body, and on 317 models i dont think there are shoulders holes, but if they do try to make it a hexagon opening it will look alot smoother

Read full topic

item.title: First armour piece
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:2, topic:362223”]How does look a 317 char model?
Also, that snake is a lot of unnecessary poly count. and try to actually manipulate the cube rather then just resize it. The shoulders don’t really exist, either, and I believe the part on the body at the bottom will be to skinny. But mainly, if you’re going to stick with this design, Make it properly fix the character and tone down the center piece.[/quote]

Thanks, it was a lame try but ima try and make it better.

Read full topic

item.title: First armour piece
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

How does look a 317 char model?
Also, that snake is a lot of unnecessary poly count. and try to actually manipulate the cube rather then just resize it. The shoulders don’t really exist, either, and I believe the part on the body at the bottom will be to skinny. But mainly, if you’re going to stick with this design, Make it properly fix the character and tone down the center piece.

Read full topic
